edu.uidaho.junicon.interpreter.interpreter

Interface IEnvironment

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IInterpreter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractShell, CommandShell, Environment, JuniconInterpreter, TransformInterpreter

    public interface IEnvironment
    Interface for accessing environment variables. An implementation should make these methods thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IEnvironment getDelegateEnvironment()
      Get the delegated environment.
      Object getEnv(String name)
      Get the value of an environment variable.
      Object getEnv(String name, Object defaultValue)
      Get the value of an environment variable.
      IEnvironment getEnvironment()
      Get the environment.
      String[] getEnvNames()
      Gets the set of environment variable names.
      void setDelegateEnvironment(IEnvironment delegate)
      Set the delegated environment.
      void setEnv(String name, Object value)
      Set the value of an environment variable.

    • Method Detail

      • getEnv

        Object getEnv(String name)
        Get the value of an environment variable.

      • getEnv

        Object getEnv(String name,
              Object defaultValue)
        Get the value of an environment variable. If not found the default value is returned.

      • setEnv

        void setEnv(String name,
            Object value)
        Set the value of an environment variable.

      • getEnvNames

        String[] getEnvNames()
        Gets the set of environment variable names.

      • getEnvironment

        IEnvironment getEnvironment()
        Get the environment.

      • setDelegateEnvironment

        void setDelegateEnvironment(IEnvironment delegate)
        Set the delegated environment.

      • getDelegateEnvironment

        IEnvironment getDelegateEnvironment()
        Get the delegated environment.
        If delegation occurs, the getEnv, setEnv, and getEnvNames methods use only the delegated environment and not this environment. This is unlike Properties, which searches defaultProperties only if local search fails.
